text: John Wesley (August 3, 1947 â€“ September 7, 2019) was an American actor. He was known for his role in Superhuman Samurai Syber-Squad, where he played the role of Principal Pratchert. He was born in Lake Charles, Louisiana. Wesley was also known for his roles in Stop! Or My Mom Will Shoot and in Hang 'Em High. Wesley died on September 7, 2019 of multiple myeloma at the age of 71. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1947 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from multiple myeloma Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Louisiana
title: John Wesley (actor)
